name: BNNSLSTMDataDescriptor
desc: A structure that contains the input-output, hidden, and cell state n-dimensional array descriptors for a long short-term memory (LSTM) layer.

items.name: init(data_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, hidden_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, cell_state_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor)
items.desc: Returns a new long short-term memory (LSTM) data descriptor structure from the specified parameters.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new long short-term memory (LSTM) data descriptor structure.

items.name: var hidden_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor of the hidden input-output.

items.name: var cell_state_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor of the cell-state input-output.
